005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
013
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
015import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
016
017/**
018 * Used in JSON (and similar formats) to identify a flag that will be used as
019 * the property name in an object hold a collection of sibling objects. Requires
020 * that siblings must never share <code>json-key</code> values.
021 */
022@SuppressWarnings({
023    "PMD.DataClass",
024    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
025})
026@MetaschemaAssembly(
027    formalName = "JSON Key",
028    description = "Used in JSON (and similar formats) to identify a flag that will be used as the property name in an object hold a collection of sibling objects. Requires that siblings must never share `json-key` values.",
029    name = "json-key",
030    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
031public class JsonKey implements IBoundObject {
032  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
033
034  /**
035   * "References the flag that will serve as the JSON key."
036   */
037  @BoundFlag(
038      formalName = "JSON Key Flag Reference",
039      description = "References the flag that will serve as the JSON key.",
040      name = "flag-ref",
041      required = true,
042      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
043  private String _flagRef;
044
045  public JsonKey() {
046    this(null);
047  }
048
049  public JsonKey(IMetaschemaData data) {
050    this.__metaschemaData = data;
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
055    return __metaschemaData;
056  }
057
058  public String getFlagRef() {
059    return _flagRef;
060  }
061
062  public void setFlagRef(String value) {
063    _flagRef = value;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public String toString() {
068    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
069  }
070}
